material.tcompat.chaotic.encyclopedia: Tool deals between (0.5 / level) and (3 * level) damage
material.tcompat.chimerite.encyclopedia: Tool increases holder / wearer mana, and gives slight boost to drops and damage
material.tcompat.dark_matter.encyclopedi: Tool can switch between dropping items and converting them in emc
material.tcompat.dawnstone.encyclopedia: Grants bonus mining speed at lower depth, +6 per 64 blocks below 64
material.tcompat.draconic.encyclopedia: Tool does 10 + (5 * level)% damage more when in the end
material.tcompat.elementium.encyclopedia: Tool sometimes spawns pixies when damaged
material.tcompat.hellforged.encyclopedia: Tool does more damage / mines faster based on the amount of will
material.tcompat.livingrock.encyclopedia: Tool absorbs mana to repair (200 mana / durability, once every 10 ticks) and prevent (100 mana / durability) damage. Each level decreases mana needed by 10 (cannot be lower than 10) and increases durability restored by 1 each tick
material.tcompat.livingwood.encyclopedia: Tool absorbs mana to repair (200 mana / durability, once every 10 ticks) and prevent (100 mana / durability) damage. Each level decreases mana needed by 10 (cannot be lower than 10) and increases durability restored by 1 each tick
material.tcompat.mana_string.encyclopedi: Tool uses 60 mana instead of arrows to shoot [Arrows take priority!]
material.tcompat.manasteel.encyclopedia: Tool absorbs 100 mana / block to increase mining speed by 50 + (25 * level)%
material.tcompat.red_matter.encyclopedia: Tool can switch between dropping items and converting them in emc
material.tcompat.redquartz.encyclopedia: Tool gains +0.5 * level damage each time an enemy is killed. This boost decreases by 0.1 every second and has a cap of 2.5 * level
material.tcompat.terrasteel.encyclopedia: Tool absorbs mana to repair (200 mana / durability, once every 10 ticks) and prevent (100 mana / durability) damage. Each level decreases mana needed by 10 (cannot be lower than 10) and increases durability restored by 1 each tick
material.tcompat.vinteum.encyclopedia: Tool uses mana to attract items and exp
material.tcompat.wyvern.encyclopedia: Tool absorbs energy to repair (200 rf / durability, once every 10 ticks) and prevent (200 rf / durability) damage. Each level decreases energy needed by 10 (cannot be lower than 100) and increases durability restored by 1 each tick
modifier.tcompat.chaotic.description: Tool randomly does more or less damage
modifier.tcompat.draconic.description: Tool does more damage in the end
modifier.tcompat.emc_generator.descripti: Allows tool to switch between dropping items and converting them to emc
modifier.tcompat.energized.description: Tool absorbs energy from player to heal and prevent damage
modifier.tcompat.energy_arrow.descriptio: Tool uses 60rf instead of arrows to shoot [Arrows take priority!]
modifier.tcompat.mana_aligned.descriptio: Tool absorbs mana from player to heal and prevent damage
modifier.tcompat.mana_arrow.description: Tool uses 60 mana instead of arrows to shoot [Arrows take priority!]
modifier.tcompat.mana_boost.description: Doing a tools main action sometimes gives bonuses in exchange of mana
modifier.tcompat.mana_crumbling.descript: Tool absorbs mana from player to speed up mining
modifier.tcompat.mana_gamble.description: When mining a stone like block there's a chance of dropping raw ores in exchange of mana
modifier.tcompat.mana_gamble.flavor: Aww, dang it! Aww, dang it! Aww, dang it!
modifier.tcompat.mana_magnet.description: Tool / Armor attracts items and exp in exchange of mana
modifier.tcompat.mana_storm.description: Tool increases holder / wearer mana capacity
modifier.tcompat.pixiecle.description: Armor has a chance to generate pixies when damaged
modifier.tcompat.sentient.description: Tool becomes stronger the more will the player has
